snippet: The Supreme Court agreed to hear a legal challenge to the health care law that deals with the subsidies that many use to buy insurance.
abstract: Editorial warns ruling against Affordable Care Act in Supreme Court case King vs Burwell would eliminate essential subsidies for more than four million lower-income Americans based on contorted reading of phrase 'established by the State'; holds opponents' tactic runs counter to stated court policy of deferring to provisions of entire law, rather than fragments thereof.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court agreed to hear a legal challenge to the health care law that deals with the subsidies that many use to buy insurance.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
